languages.text: "Могу только воззвать к здравому смыслу. Маршал Стракс! Вы знаете хотя бы один случай, когда еретик пытался воровать десятину, захватив с собой пару десятков арбитров?"
"I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"
languages.original_text: "Могу только воззвать к здравому смыслу. Маршал Стракс! Вы знаете хотя бы один случай, когда еретик пытался воровать десятину, захватив с собой пару десятков арбитров?"

traits.locale_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"
"I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"
"I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"
"I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"
"I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

languages.text: "Ich kann nur an Euren gesunden Menschenverstand appellieren. Marschall Strachs! Könnt Ihr Euch erinnern, dass ein Ketzer, der versucht hat, den Zehnt zu stehlen, jemals von ein paar Dutzend Arbitratoren dabei unterstützt wurde?"
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nur an Euren gesunden Menschenverstand appellieren. Marschall Strachs! Könnt Ihr Euch erinnern, dass ein Ketzer, der versucht hat, den Zehnt zu stehlen, jemals von ein paar Dutzend Arbitratoren dabei unterstützt wurde?"

languages.text: « Je ne peux qu'en appeler à votre bon sens. Maréchal Strachs ! Avez-vous souvenir d'une seule affaire où un hérétique aurait tenté de dérober la dîme en étant escorté de plusieurs dizaines d'arbitrators ? »
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux qu'en appeler à votre bon sens. Maréchal Strachs ! Avez-vous souvenir d'une seule affaire où un hérétique aurait tenté de dérober la dîme en étant escorté de plusieurs dizaines d'arbitrators ? »

languages.text: “我希望你能用常识仔细考虑考虑，斯塔克斯元帅！真的会有哪个异端分子，会在几十个法务官陪同的情况下盗取什一税吗？你回想一下，这种事情真的发生过哪怕一次吗？”
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: “我希望你能用常识仔细考虑考虑，斯塔克斯元帅！真的会有哪个异端分子，会在几十个法务官陪同的情况下盗取什一税吗？你回想一下，这种事情真的发生过哪怕一次吗？”

languages.text: «Tan solo puedo apelar a su sentido común. ¡Mariscal Strachs! ¿Recuerda un solo caso en el que un hereje se rodeara de una veintena de Arbitrator para intentar robar el diezmo?».
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: «Tan solo puedo apelar a su sentido común. ¡Mariscal Strachs! ¿Recuerda un solo caso en el que un hereje se rodeara de una veintena de Arbitrator para intentar robar el diezmo?».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}はただ、君自身の常識に訴えるしかない。ストラッチス将帥！異端者が租税を盗もうとして、数十人ものアービトレイターを連れて行動した例を、一つでも思い出せるか？」
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}はただ、君自身の常識に訴えるしかない。ストラッチス将帥！異端者が租税を盗もうとして、数十人ものアービトレイターを連れて行動した例を、一つでも思い出せるか？」

languages.text: "Sizi sağduyuya davet ediyorum Miralay Strachs! Bir kâfirin yanına onlarca Yargıcı alıp aşar çalmaya kalkışması, akla mantığa sığar bir hareket mi? Siz hiç gördünüz mü böyle bir şey?"
languages.original_text: "I can but appeal to your own common sense. Marshal Strachs! Can you recall even one instance where a heretic attempted to steal the tithe while taking a few dozen Arbitrators along for company?"

traits.locale_text: "Sizi sağduyuya davet ediyorum Miralay Strachs! Bir kâfirin yanına düzinelerce Yargıcı alıp aşar çalmaya kalkışması, akla mantığa sığar bir hareket mi? Siz hiç gördünüz mü böyle bir şey?"
